Package pointOfSales

package pointOfSales
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    pointOfSales.entities
     
    pointOfSales.services
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    app
    This class is the main application class that launches the application
    foodItemButtonController
    The foodItemButtonController class controls the logic for the food categories.
    loginPage
    The loginPage class loads the UI elements from the loginPage.fxml file, and performs some modifications to it.
    loginPageController
    The loginPageController class is used to control the logic of the loginPage Specifically this class handles making all the buttons and password fields function and connects the UI to the backend and database.
    managerPage
    The managerPage class initializes and modifies the UI for the manager.fxml design file.
    managerPageController
    The managerPageController function handles all the logic that for the manager page The logic includes but is not limited to switching active scenes/AnchorPanes.
    menuItemButtonController
    The menuItemButtonController class controls the logic for the product buttons
    orderedProduct
    The orderedProduct class is a format class used to store the information that the backend needs.
    orderPage
    The orderPage class is the UI class for the checkoutPage.
    orderPageController
    The orderPageController class is the logic class for the checkoutPage.
    sceneController
    The sceneController class handles all the scene changing logic
